name: Fightosis VS (By Bio Corp.)
description: Fightosis is a 2D beat 'em up , platformer hybrid where a patient has contracted bacteria and viruses. You take on the role of the patient's immune system as a white blood cell that must cure the person. Travel to the four infected areas and  battle some of the worst viruses and bacteria to eventually face off against the worst virus of all, COVID-19.  (Best played with your screen zoomed in at 50% when in full screen mode)
